title.narrative: In-Country Counternarcotics Program: Small-scale Construction

description.narrative: Croatian National Police Academy dormitory renovation: Facility Supports the Balkan Regional Counter Trafficking Center. under U.S. European Command. The U.S. Department of Defense International Counter-Drug Program (ICDP) enables the Secretary of Defense to provide foreign governments with support, such as training and equipment, to combat illicit drug trafficking and transnational organized crime.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - ISAF Deployment Enhancement

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to build Croatian forces tactical effectiveness by providing modern, tactical equipment and enhanced communications packages in preparation for their deployment to Afghanistan and participation in Military Assistance Teams (MAT) responsible for training and mentoring Afghan security forces. Equipment provided includes radios, battlespace management equipment, thermal imaging and night vision devices, vehicle marking kits, and heavy machine guns. The recipient unit will be the Croatian Army Training and Doctrine Command, which will be used to train battalions from two armor brigades deploying to support MATs.
